alert.note: Alert for Cheshire; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 8:59AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Cheshire and northwestern Hillsborough Counties through 930 AM EDT... At 859 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Harrisville, or 8 miles north of Jaffrey, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Keene, Jaffrey, Henniker, Peterborough, New Boston, Antrim, Greenfield, Lyndeborough, Dublin, Francestown, Bennington, Harrisville, Nelson, Marlborough, Hancock, Goffstown, Deering, Weare, Roxbury and Hillsborough. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
